definition: creative activity (writing or pictures or films etc.) of no literary or artistic value other than to stimulate sexual desire, affect with smut or mildew, as of a crop such as corn
details:
noun
- creative activity (writing or pictures or films etc.) of no literary or artistic value other than to stimulate sexual desire
= synonyms: pornography
- an offensive or indecent word or phrase
= synonyms: obscenity
- any fungus of the order Ustilaginales
= synonyms: smut fungus
- destructive diseases of plants (especially cereal grasses) caused by fungi that produce black powdery masses of spores
- a black colloidal substance consisting wholly or principally of amorphous carbon and used to make pigments and ink
= synonyms: crock, carbon black, lampblack, soot
verb
- affect with smut or mildew, as of a crop such as corn
- become affected with smut
= example: become affected with smut
- stain with a dirty substance, such as soot
- make obscene
= example: make obscene
